thread.title: Blast threats as man mounts footpath outside Adelaide Hilton with car loaded with has cylinders - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Blast threats as man mounts footpath outside Adelaide Hilton with car loaded with has cylinders - Yahoo7

author: Hannah Foord
title: Blast threats as man mounts footpath outside Adelaide Hilton with car loaded with has cylinders - Yahoo7
text:
Share Blast threats as man mounts footpath outside Adelaide Hilton with car loaded with has cylinders - Yahoo7 A Broadview man has been arrested after allegedly going on a terrifying tirade in the heart of Adelaide. Close Blast threats in heart of Adelaide as man launches terrifying tirade UP NEXT VIDEO Broadview man arrested after Adelaide Hilton gas canister threats. 7News Blast threats in heart of Adelaide as man launches terrifying tirade 
He drove a car loaded with has cylinders onto a busy footpath before allegedly threatening to blow up a government building. 
STAR Force officers were hot on his tail. Police officers arrested the man a short time later on nearby Hindley Street. Photo: 7 News 
Security cameras in Hindley Street captured the 38-year-old’s arrest. 
The drama began mid-morning on Monday when the Holden was driven up onto the pavement outside the Hilton Hotel. 
Bewildered pedestrians surrounded the car – little did they know it was a ticking bomb, packed with gas.
